channel.title: Guides on Site Bay Guides & Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Guides on Site Bay Guides & Tutorials

item.title: Cancel Your Account
item.description: A Site Bay account enables you to deploy and use services on the Site Bay Platform.

item.title: Security Controls for User Accounts
item.description: To protect your Site Bay user account against unauthorized access, there are several security controls you can implement.

item.title: Change Your Email Address
item.description: Site Bay uses the contact information on file in your account to notify and bill you.

item.title: Manage User Permissions
item.description: Each user on an account can be given individualized permissions that provides unrestricted access to an account or limits their access to specific information or services.

item.title: Manage Users on a Site Bay Account
item.description: You can grant other people access to your My Site Bay account by creating users and assigning permissions to restrict access to certain areas of the control panel.

item.title: Reset Your User Password
item.description: Creating strong passwords is essential to protecting your Site Bay and your Site Bay My Site Bay account.
